name: Mark Zuckerberg
text: I've been wanting an economy Les Paul type guitar that would serve as an all-around player for rehearsals and even gigs, but something that wouldn't the bank. I work at a local Music store that also does guitar repairs.

name: Bill Gates
text: I've owned this guitar 2 months now and it is one of 4 electric guitars that I own. The guitar is an outstanding value and a real joy to play. I highly recommend it for any beginner or intermediate player and a great practice guitar for an advanced player who wants to limit wear on their professional series guitars.

name: Elon Musk
text: This is a great deal for a very nice guitar . Sharp looking.,premium extras like coil splitting,locking tuners . Wide neck with good action. On par with some mid range Asian made axes

name: Arijit Singh
text: This guitar is a great budget single cutaway design, it plays really well for the price, the pickups are decent the coil splitting leads to some nice tones

name: Atif Aslam
text: I bought this because it was cheap, and I wanted a guitar that I could try out different components on without worrying about messing it up. So far, I haven't changed anything because the guitar sounds great

name: Shreya Ghoshal
text: It feels great in the hand, has incredibly versatile tones thanks to coil splitting for both pickups and sounds great in any pickup configuration. Bottom line: if you record you can't tell if it's a Les Paul, PRS or any other high-end axe. They got this right! Peace.
